entries.category: The Clone Relics, A fallen hero
entries.journal_entry_description: One of the troopers of the Clone Wars wants revenge for being left to die by his old commander, now a corrupt arms dealer selling imperial military material.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You have agreed to try and gather evidence that Mort's old commander is now an arms dealer selling Imperial military hardware. His name is Morkov and he resides in the Keren hotel. Maybe the best way would be to pretend that you are interested in buying weapons?
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have set up a deal with Morkov and you're to meet his courier in an abandoned building opposite to the hotel in Dee'Ja peak on Naboo. He will be located upstairs with the blasters you 'ordered'. You have a feeling this will get violent when they figure out you have no money but hopefully you can find some good information on the courier.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The courier and his bodyguards are attacking you! Defend yourself and see if you can find anything useful among the courier's belongings.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The courier had on him logs of all his and Morkov's transactions for the last year. This should be what Mort needs. Return to him in the Dearic cantina on Talus.
